rules_text:
Whenever you take a burden, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
[i]Otherworld[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has been burdened three or more times, you may put a creature card that was exiled with this creature onto the battlefield under your control. If you do, sacrifice Dahlia.
